~cards~ sounds fine.

~cards~ for me. Thank you.
~cards~ sounds fine.

I have to swap these cards to have any chance of winning.
New cards please. These are just not doing it.
I'm going to need some better cards.
Hmph, but if I don't do it she'll win...
I know, Chun-Li. But I can't let her win!
Chun-Li! This is a surprise. But since that you're here, we can finally take Juri down together.
C-Chun-Li?! I wasn't expecting to see you. I'm here because of Juri, so I might need your help.
It's okay, Chun-Li. It was either her or the dolls. You still deserved that punch, Juri.
We both know that Juri will take any opportunity she can get to use her dirty tactics. It's not your fault, Chun-Li.
Taking control of another's body... You abhorrent thing! If it wasn't for Nayru, I'd extinguish you with my own hands!
You monster! I know what it feels like to lose control of one's body. As soon as you leave Nayru's body I'll crush you.
(Chun-Li's body is so beautiful...)
(Chun-Li has such a beautiful body from every angle...)
(Will I ever have a body as beautiful as Chun-Li's?)
(With a perfect body like hers, no wonder everybody can't stop looking at Chun-Li.)
Juri...
If that's what you want, Juri, I won't lose!
If you're trying to provoke me to turn around, I won't do it, Juri. I only do it when I want.
You're just now realizing that, Shimakaze? Uff...
You didn't know until now? This game won't be kind to you if you don't apply yourself, Shimakaze.
The last battle is against Chun-Li? I don't like my odds.
I'm up against Chun-Li next? I don't like this.
Chun-Li is my final opponent? Why couldn't it be someone else?
Juri!!!
It's only Juri now. I can do this!
Now I just have to focus on Juri. Let's go!
It's okay, Chun-Li. It was more embarrassing than painful, but I don't blame you.
Don't blame yourself, Chun-Li. I'm sure if it wasn't you, another doll would've come to destroy my leotard.
She's your consort? That's surprising. Not because she's a woman, but because she's a ghost... right?
Your consort? Isn't she a... ghost?
Chun-Li?! Why are you here? Are you working too?
Chun-Li?! You didn't tell me you were gonna be here! You're on duty, right?
Juri! This is more serious than I thought.
Juri! So you are here after all.
Rainbow Mika? Why are you here? Aren't you a wrestler?
Rainbow Mika? I thought you were into wrestling, why are you here?
I am fine. Although something was strange about this attack...
Don't worry, Chun-Li. I'm all right. But something bothers me about this attack...
Stop talking about my... bum, Juri. And if people truly think that, it's none of your business.
I doubt anyone looks at my bum as much as you, Juri. As for the rest of the people, they can do whatever they want.
What? You think I don't know how to shave? Let me tell you... Ugh, why am I explaining myself to you?
I hate so much that Juri had to see me like this. She'll never stop mentioning this now.
No, it's okay, Chun-Li. If I've come this far, I might as well just finish the game.
That wouldn't be fair to the other players, Chun-Li. I have been playing the game, so I must finish it.
You're the worst, Juri. I'll never forgive you for this, no matter how many compliments you give me.
I want you to know you're the absolute worst and I hate with all my heart, Juri. But thank you for noticing...
I'm the only woman? Oh, ok.
Only me and these men? That's fine.
Just so you know, I'm not uncomfortable playing fighting against men. So it shouldn't be any different playing strip poker, right?
It will be ok. This is no different than fighting against men, except we'll have to take off our clothes when we lose...Uhhh...
There are no men here? That's fine, I wasn't expecting to see one anyway.
Only women, huh? I would've thought men would be interested in this sort of activity too.
Oh, there's not a single man here tonight. That's unusual, right?
Is it common to play this game only between women? I'm just curious.
With only three players this shouldn't take long.
Just the three of us, right? That's perfect.
With only three players, the game will be over soon and I can move on to more pressing matters.
Just three players? This is not how it's usually played, right? I'm not complaining.
We're both naked now. That means this is the last round, right? I can't lose!
Is this the last round? I can't lose then! I have to focus.
The final round. Now is when it counts, I have to win.
Don't misread things. I'm not here for pleasure, I've received intel of Shadaloo activity in the area, so I'm here to check on that.
If any of you are wondering, I'm not here because of the game. I've been informed that members of Shadaloo have been sighted in this place, so I'm here to look into it.
Have any of you seen anything suspicious? I'm here to check on reports of Shadaloo activity in the area, not because of this silly game.
Before you ask anything, I'm here because we've received information of Shadaloo activity in this area. I'll have to keep an eye open.
I'm an agent of Delta Red. We believe Shadaloo might be involved here. I have to keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
My name is Cammy White, I work for Delta Red. I've been ordered to infiltrate this shady game because we've received reports of Shadaloo activity in the area.
How long has it been since the game begun? It feels like an eternity.
I thought the game would've been over by now.
This game has been going for so long that people at HQ must be getting worried about me.
It's been so long since we started playing, and I'm feeling tired. But I can't lose focus now.
If I can finish this game without losing once, it would be perfect.
It seems it might be possible to finish this without taking off any of my clothes. That's more than I was expecting.
I've won several rounds without losing once. I'll do my best so that won't happen.
Brilliant, I haven't lost in a while. I'll try to finish my mission without taking off anything important.
I've gotten used to what I'm wearing right now. I'll avoid losing again at all cost.
Finishing this game without losing anything more than this would be a huge victory for me.
It's been a while since they showed up. Maybe they won't attack if I don't lose again.
The dolls haven't attacked me again. Is this because I keep winning? Then I can't lose again!
I'm not losing anymore. Otherwise, they will attack again and I might lose more of my clothes.
My leotard has been ripped. I guess I should be thankful that this means I can play a little longer, but this is uncomfortable.
They torned my leotard. What am I supposed to do now? Even if I win without losing again, I can't go outside dressed like this!
Why did they have to destroy the bottom half of my leotard? I guess it's only been a little frail, but still...
Now everything but my breasts is visible. This is unpleasant.
They haven't attacked me again after they took off half of my leotard. Maybe they left...?
